summary: The implementation includes all 8 requirements with navigation, sections, and styling. However, some exact color values and styling specifications differ from the BuildRequest. The backend is empty as expected for a static website.

missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows menu cards using Tailwind's Card component with default styling, but the exact 10px border-radius specified in REQ-4 acceptance criteria is not explicitly set in the visible code

missing_requirements.requirement: Submit button with exact #ff6f00 background color
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a Button component but the exact #ff6f00 color specification for the submit button is not visible in the truncated App.tsx code

missing_requirements.requirement: Google Maps iframe with exact src URL and 250px height
missing_requirements.reason: The Contact section is mentioned in the summary but the Google Maps iframe implementation details are not visible in the truncated App.tsx code

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer with exact #333 background color and copyright text
missing_requirements.reason: Footer is mentioned in the summary but implementation details including the exact #333 background color are not visible in the truncated App.tsx code
Sections use py-16 px-6 (64px vertical, 24px horizontal) and py-12 (48px vertical) instead of the specified 30px padding

hallucinated_features.description: React state management with useState for form data
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies no backend functionality or form processing, but React state and form submission handler were added
Form displays an alert message 'Thank you for your order! We will contact you soon.' which was not requested in the specifications

hallucinated_features.description: Smooth scroll behavior with JavaScript function
hallucinated_features.reason: JavaScript scrollToSection function added in addition to CSS smooth scrolling, which is more than what was specified
Header includes decorative hero-sweets image as overlay background, but images were only requested for display purposes, not as decorative overlays
Full authentication setup with useInternetIdentity hook and AuthClient, which contradicts the non-goal of 'User authentication'
CSS includes complete dark mode color scheme not mentioned in requirements
Heart icon imported but not specified in any requirement
